About.Heading: Al-Asema
About.P: Al Asema Company is one of the leading companies specializing in compressed air technology, integrated engineering and industrial solutions, and production line equipment.

Ul.0: Maintenance and overhauls for all types of screw compressors, along with comprehensive maintenance contracts.
Ul.1: Supply of spare parts for all air compressors available in the Egyptian market.
Ul.2: Authorized distributors for SOTRAS and MANN Filter, providing all types of filters and separator components for equipment.
Ul.3: We have a distinguished team of engineers and technicians who have received top-level training and have extensive experience working with major brands.
Ul.4: We offer imported screw air compressors for all applications.

MainHeading.P: The services provided by Al-Asema Company in the fields of screw compressors, pneumatics, air conditioning and refrigeration.

0.0: Authorized distributors for SOTRAS and MANN FILTER screw compressors available in the Egyptian market.
0.1: Providing all compressor accessories, including valves, sensors, gauges, and gears.
0.2: We offer imported air compressors from Atlas Copco, Kaeser, and other trusted brands known for their efficiency and the ease of providing after-sales services.
0.3: Maintenance and complete overhauls for all types of screw compressors.
0.5: Reconditioning worn-out screw compressors electrically and mechanically to restore them to efficient operation.
0.6: We have a distinguished team of engineers and technicians who have received top-level training and possess extensive experience working with major dealerships.

1.0: Distributors of leading global brands such as PNEUMAX, HAFNER, and SHAKO.
1.1: We offer various types of valves (manual and air-actuated) suitable for all industries.
1.2: We provide stainless steel valves in all sizes.
1.3: We offer 2/2 solenoids from the Turkish brand Jifacs with Italian coils (air, water, diesel, steam), available with or without a timer.
1.4: We provide everything needed for the air line, including pistons, valves, service units, hoses, and quick connectors, in German and Italian quality.
1.5: We have a maintenance workshop for servicing air and hydraulic pistons in all sizes and different shapes.

2.0: Assembly and manufacturing of chillers in various sizes, along with the supply of imported chillers in excellent condition, complete with all necessary warranties.
2.1: Maintenance of all chillers available in the Egyptian market, carried out by a team of engineers and technicians specialized in refrigeration and air conditioning.
2.2: Maintenance and supply of air dryers, as well as maintenance and supply of refrigeration towers and various refrigeration rooms.

MainHeading.P: Our products guarantee customers achieve sustainable productivity in a wide range of markets, including general engineering, manufacturing and process industries, construction, automotive, pharmaceutical, food and much more.
